resources.string: Login failed. Please make sure you have wifi. Other than that, maybe the email or the password is not correct. If the problem persists, please contact admin@jessbitcom.pro
Please enter the verification code in the email.
Your email and your account is verified. Please login with the email.
We couldn\'t verify your email. Please make sure you have wifi, and the confirmation code is correct.
Please enter the email you registered the app.
New verification code was sent to your email. Please check your email.
We couldn\'t send a verification code. Please make sure that you have wifi, and the email is the one you use to register the app. Other than that, the server may be down.
You are successfully registered. We sent a verification code to your email. You need to confirm your email before logging in.

There is error registering your account. Please make sure you have wifi, and the email is not registered before. Other than that, the server may be in maintenance. If the problem persists, please contact admin@jessbitcom.pro
You need a verification code in order to reset your password.
I don\'t have a verification code

We couldn\'t reset your password. Please make sure you have wifi and the code is correct. Other than that, the server might be down. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact admin@jessbitcom.pro
We sent the verification code to your email.

We couldn\'t send the verification code. Please make sure you have wifi. Other than that, the server might be down. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact admin@jessbitcom.pro
We couldn\'t update your password. Please make sure you have wifi and the current password is correct. If the problem persists, please contact admin@jessbitcom.pro
New password must be different from the current password.
There is error getting response from the bot.
